title:
Impact of atomic initial conditions on nonclassicality of the light in
  the ladder-type three-level Jaynes-Cummings model
authors:
Leonardi Hern\'andez S\'anchez, Ariel Flores Rosas, Sergio Mendoza
  V\'azquez, Ir\'an Ramos Prieto, Francisco Soto Eguibar and H\'ector Manuel
  Moya Cessa
abstract:
We explore the interaction between a three-level atom and a single-mode
quantized cavity, known as the three-level ladder-type Jaynes-Cummings model.
By employing the exact solution of the Schr\"odinger equation, we investigate
how the initial conditions of the atom influence the occupation probabilities
of the atomic energy levels, average photon number, and the nonclassicality of
light, assessed through the Mandel $\mathcal{Q} (t)$ parameter and the Wigner
function. Our findings are rigorously validated through comprehensive numerical
simulations, ensuring robust and consistent outcomes.
